name: Mountain Pose
description: Standing tall with feet together and hands by the side.

name: Tree Pose
description: Balancing on one leg with the other foot on the inner thigh, hands together above the head.

name: Triangle Pose
description: Legs wide apart, one arm reaching down and the other up to form a triangle shape.

name: Warrior I
description: Front knee bent, back leg straight, arms extended overhead.

name: Warrior II
description: Front knee bent, back leg straight, arms extended sideways.

name: Warrior III
description: Balancing on one leg, arms and torso extended forward.

name: Chair Pose
description: Bending the knees as if sitting on an invisible chair with arms raised.

name: Cobra Pose
description: Lying face down, lifting the chest using back strength.

name: Downward Dog
description: Body forms an inverted V, hands and feet pressing into the floor.

name: Upward Dog
description: Chest lifted and thighs off the ground, supported by hands.

name: Child's Pose
description: Kneeling and folding forward with arms extended.

name: Cat Pose
description: On all fours, arch the back upward like a stretching cat.

name: Cow Pose
description: On all fours, dip the belly down and lift the head up.

name: Bridge Pose
description: Lying on the back, lift the hips upward.

name: Camel Pose
description: Kneeling and bending backward to touch heels with hands.

name: Boat Pose
description: Balancing on sit bones, raising legs and upper body in a V shape.

name: Seated Forward Bend
description: Sitting and bending forward to reach toes.

name: Half Lord of the Fishes
description: Seated twist with one leg crossed over the other.

name: Fish Pose
description: Lying on the back, arch the chest and lift the head slightly.

name: Shoulder Stand
description: Balancing on shoulders with legs and torso vertical.

name: Plow Pose
description: From Shoulder Stand, bring legs over the head to touch the floor.

name: Bow Pose
description: On stomach, grab ankles and lift chest and legs.

name: Locust Pose
description: On stomach, lift arms, chest, and legs upward.

name: Crow Pose
description: Balancing on arms with knees resting on triceps.

name: Side Plank
description: Balancing on one arm, body in a straight line.

name: Plank Pose
description: Body straight, supported by arms and toes.

name: Low Lunge
description: Front knee bent, back knee on the floor, arms raised.

name: High Lunge
description: Front knee bent, back leg straight, arms overhead.

name: Pigeon Pose
description: Front leg bent in front, back leg extended behind.

name: Reclined Pigeon Pose
description: On back, ankle crossed over opposite knee.

name: Low Lunge
description: Front knee bent, back knee on the floor, arms raised.

name: High Lunge
description: Front knee bent, back leg straight, arms overhead.

name: Pigeon Pose
description: Front leg bent in front, back leg extended behind.

name: Happy Baby Pose
description: Lying on back, holding feet with hands.

name: Unknown Pose
description: We couldn’t detect a known yoga pose. Try standing back and making sure your full body is visible!
